Summary: Nothing like the photos.  Dump. Charged me a $300 deposit.  Then refused to let me have a late check out (1.5 hour late). I had to pay for a full night. Pretty sickened by the service. Traveling for a soccer tournament- should have paid the extra $$$ for a real hotel.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear we didn't meet your expectations.  Our housekeeping staff has to have enough time to clean the rooms before the next check in's and we are not always able to give late check outs.   The deposit is clearly posted on all sites and at the front desk, which is returned at check out.  We are also very competitive with our prices compared to other hotels in our area.

Summary: Dirty stained sheets, week carpeted floor, dirty bathroom. I mean it looks like they tried to remodel but they half assed it. Next door is a bar and liquor store, not a super safe neighborhood. The pictures looked so nice but very misleading.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your stay.  We recently completed a renovation and take great pride in our cleanliness.  Our property is very secure as we have a 24 hour front desk, and we have security cameras as well.

Summary: Modern rooms and great customer service.  Hotel 39 is our new hotel of choice in Orange County.  Walking distance to great food and an Uber away from attractions in Anaheim.    The Guest Services team was very friendly and accommodating and exceeded our expectations!
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear our staff exceeded your expectations.  We work hard to go the extra step and glad you noticed.  We hope your travels bring you back to us very soon.

Summary: This hotel has been recently re-decorated, and looks nicer on the inside than you'd expect from the outside.  It is small, but has an elevator.  All rooms are non-smoking.  The breakfast room accommodates six people.  The food offered is pre-packaged, nothing hot except toast. Very small swimming pool, no spa. This is a decent place to stay in the coastal area.  Only a ten minute drive to Huntington Beach and Pacific Coast Highway.  It's named Hotel 39 because it is on Beach Blvd (Hwy 39).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us.  We are glad to hear you liked our renovations and hope your travels bring you back to us very soon.

Summary: We had 5 rooms on the first night and 3 rooms for the next 2 days and the rooms were clean and comfortable. The hotel was well located to where we wanted to be. We want to go to little Siagon for shopping and food.
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear our location worked well for you and you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope your travels bring you back to us very soon.

Summary: This is clearly an older building structurally, but there have been excellent upgrades made to the interior rooms. Bed was really comfortable, linens and decor were fresh and appealing, staff was excellent, It's a great value, and I will definitely plan to stay here again when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review.  We greatly appreciate it and glad to hear you found it was of great value.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Stayed at the hotel 39 and I thought it was going to be a small cheap little motel but when I got into my room I was in shock and the room was a lot bigger then expected. Not bad for $75 for the night. Would definitely recommend coming here again if it’s it’s this cheap
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review.  We're glad to hear we exceeded your expectations and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Stay in Huntington Beach, CA
Summary: We stayed for a week at Hotel 39 on Beach Blvd. just north of I405. The room was nice, clean and smelled good. Bathroom was big, functional and clean. Staff were friendly and helpful, especially the maintenance man, who helped me get the closed captions on the TV. Maybe front fesk can let people know how staff needs to put cc on TVs. Breakfast selection is adequate, but there isn't a lot of seating. Less than a half mile from great restaurants,including Marie Callenders and Lost Dog and Chick-fil-a.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. We appreciate the kind words and glad to hear you had a great stay.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Bed bugs.  I was bitten on each of my arms and legs quite extensively, and even after a week, they are still itching quite a bit.  I thought the room smelled chemically funny (I'm not sure if they were spraying the room already, but there was whitish powder on the corners that I thought was just detergent, but may be insecticide instead).  In any case, if they are treating the room, it isn't working.  Recommend the owners shut down the block of rooms and do a full fumigation.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for choosing the Hotel 39 Westminster during your last visit to our area. We appreciate the review and we take it quite seriously- for improvement. At the outset, our apologies for the bad experience you had howsoever. We are also acting on the bugs and cleanliness issue. We shall take whatever steps necessary to avoid such unpleasant incidence. We shall see that it is never happens in future.  We also have given special training and instructions to the hotel staff to check all the rooms prior to checking in a new guest. We assure you and request you to consider staying with us in future and have a new satisfactory experience.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: clean  lobby  and  rooms  friendly staff  some  common  area  needs  to  be  steam cleaned  will  be  back..
Summary: 1 st  floor  room  was  convenient   good  elevator  good  breakfast  good  parking   and  felt  very  secure  also  room  was  very  large  spacy  also   the  staff  was   helpful  and  always  friendly  I  had  a  very  bad  experience  with  the  best  western  on  Westminster  blv  will  never  recommend  that  hotel  ever  ......
Room tip: all  rooms  are  good  air  cond.  are  quiet
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your kind words about our room, convenient elevator and good breakfast with plenty of amenities and very large rooms. We take serving our guests very seriously and are very pleased that we met your needs so well in many ways. I am glad you want you to serve you again. .  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Pay a few more $$'s not worth any price!!
Summary: This place is really bad, dirty, loud(surrounded by very loud streets), motorcycles all night driving by, homeless doing drugs next to the parking lot, rocks for mattresses and a very rude staff.  Stay far away.  I stay at hotels about 5 nights a month, and this is the worst I've stayed at in years.  Just got a good deal at $55 a night, but would not stay again for free!!!  NEVER STAY HERE!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m terribly sorry that we failed to meet your expectations in some ways. We take real pride in this hotel and believe that pride shows in everything we do. I’m disappointed that we could not satisfy you, and I hope you will try us again in the future. We’re always working to make the guest experience better than ever before.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Found women's lingerie next to the beds along with grape stems. Bathroom had hair on floor and toilet seats and the tub was grimy.   When I called and made reservation, was told I could have crib for my infant. When arrived, was told they do not offer such thing.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for commenting. I’m very sorry that several customer service issues detracted so much from your stay. We’re in the process of improving all aspects of the hotel, including our staffing and service. I regret that there was confusion and that we let you down in some ways. I hope your stay was otherwise nice, and I hope you will allow us to better satisfy you in the future.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Just needed 2 dble queen rooms for my family overnight to attend a funeral.  Beds were comfortable and clean. The room was spacious enough for 3 of us in each room. The inroom microwave, fridge and complimentary breakfast were helpful and adequate.  Mgmt were friendly and provided good service.  We asked for and got an iron, ironing board, and more face towels. It's across from auto row so at night there were some motorcycle sounds that woke us now and then. w
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We thank you for your appreciation of our services and facilities. We are a team of professionals committed to provide a superior service to our guests. Thank you for pointing out all our qualities. We really appreciated your feedback. Also, we hope you will recommend us to your friends and families. We hope to see you again. Thank you.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: I was in Huntington Beach for an event with my company and I stayed at the Super 8. Staff was friendly and accommodating, rooms were clean and quiet and the hotel was very close to the freeway and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your kind words. I’m so pleased that you found us a clean and pleasant place to stay and that our amenities were to your liking. We take real pride in this hotel and in serving guests like you, and I’m extremely happy that you had such a pleasant stay. We look forward to having you with us again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: there's a mini liquor store that delivers within a 3 mile radius .. luckily they're right next door :D .. Quiet hotel space i loved it
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We very much appreciate and value your feedback. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. I will share this review with my team and we’ll strive to make your next stay even better. Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than this one.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Jay at the front desk was very helpful. We got there early...
Summary: Jay at the front desk was very helpful. We got there early and he found us a room that was perfect with space for handicapped access. For a free breakfast it was wonderful with waffles cereals fruit toast danishes coffee tea and oatmeal
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your kind words. We take serving our guests very seriously and are very pleased that we met your needs so well. I hope you will tell others about our property and stay with us again the next time you’re in town. We appreciate the opportunity to serve you.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Close to 405 and restaurants. Immediate location leaves a lot to be desired-strip bar and liquor store. Although room was private, quiet and pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for staying at the Hotel 39 Westminster during your recent visit to our area. We appreciate your review and the observations. They are serious to us and we shall surely take them for improvement.  We are addressing your observations point by point for further improvement and you shall definitely see the difference during your next visit. We await your earliest next trip to our area and promise a nice stay with us.  Sincerely Hotel Manager.

Summary: The room was dirty, fingernail clippings on the floor, blood splatter on wall of bathroom next to the toilet. I had to cover my pillow with a tee shirt because it smelled like grease and diesel. The mattress looked and felt like it was from the 70's.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for commenting. I apologize that a single failing by our housekeeping staff detracted from your stay. We’re already working to improve our housekeeping services and can assure you that such an oversight won’t happen again. I regret any ways we failed to meet your needs and hope you will focus on the many good things about our hotel when making travel plans in this area again.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Nice, confortable,  and clean remodeled rooms. Just for the price. Stores Restauranrs and entretainent a block away!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind words. I’m so pleased that you found us a clean and pleasant place to stay and that our amenities were to your liking. We take real pride in this hotel and in serving guests like you, and I’m extremely happy that you had such a pleasant stay. We look forward to having you with us again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: My Sister and my  brother was with me, we needed an overnight stay it was a last minute booking that I booked on my iPhone. We  arrived late at night almost midnight. *Front desk employees was friendly,  *The out side has a couple of planters unattended needs help with unkept dying plants.  *The  surrounding is not inviting needs to create garden like atmosphere. *Room is clean and spacious .  I just booked 5 rooms for 2 nights stay, we on a road trip to pay our respect to family member just past.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m pleased you had a pleasant experience. We’ll take your comment about garden atmosphere in consideration as we change and improve. I hope you’ll be able to stay with us again soon. We always appreciate being of service to guests who appreciate what we offer.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Amazing stay. Jason and Dave was amazing people had a chat in the mornings before I went to work. They was both excellent with customer service. Thank you for the amazing stay I will head back to the uk and recommend tho place. It's affordable and comfortable and clean rooms daily.   Thank you Super8
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I’m so pleased that you would recommend our hotel to others traveling in huntington Beach Area. I’m glad you had such a nice experience with us, and I sincerely thank you for your positive comments. We enjoy providing a great experience for all kinds of travelers, and I’m very pleased that you enjoyed being with us at our hotel. We’ll be here for you in the future if you visit the area again, and we always strive to maintain a great experience for our guests like you.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Smelled like a dog lived in room. Bathroom was sooo gross, wiped lid of toilet only to find yellow gunk and tiny hairs! Staff super nice but will never stay again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I’m terribly sorry that we failed to meet your expectations in some ways. We take real pride in this hotel and believe that pride shows in everything we do. I’m disappointed that we could not satisfy you, and I hope you will try us again in the future. We’re always working to make the guest experience better than ever before.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: We were pleased to find this place during our recent weekend stay. We had two rooms, double queen beds, and single king size, and both were in great shape and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for staying with us. I’m very glad that our hotel impressed you in so many ways. We focus on offering a guest experience that will satisfy a wide range of travelers. When you’re in the area again, I hope you will make us your first choice. We’ll be here when you need us with another great stay that you’re sure to like again.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Always welcoming even on short notice
Summary: Local hotel I often use for guests. Rooms are spacious, good bang for your buck.  Staff is always friendly and even on short notice, they always seem to squeeze me in.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your kind and thorough comments. I’m so pleased that you would stay with us. We take pride in this hotel and its amenities and sincerely appreciate the opportunity to serve you. I’m glad we could satisfy you, as we do so many others each day. Thanks again for taking so much time with your comments.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: I was really impressed with this hotel.  Clean, smoke-free, conveniently located.  Friendly staff.  In room microwave, fridge and coffee maker.  My new favorite.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your kind comments. I’m so pleased that you would stay with us again, and I hope you have the opportunity to do that soon. We take pride in this hotel and its amenities and sincerely appreciate the opportunity to serve you. I’m glad we could satisfy you, as we do so many others each day. Thanks again for your pleasant feedback.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: It had convenient parking.  It was a clean room with a comfortable bed and a nice color TV.  It was quiet and convenient being only 10 miles and 20 minutes from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your kind words. I’m so pleased that you found us a clean and pleasant place to stay and that our amenities were to your liking. We take real pride in this hotel and in serving guests like you, and I’m extremely happy that you had such a pleasant stay. We look forward to having you with us again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Room was nice, clean, hardwood flooring was nice.  A/C did not really cool the room.  Bed was not comfortable.  Breakfast was terrible
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing the Super8  It is nice to know that you enjoyed the room and amenities.  We shall certainly look into and resolve the AC and breakfast comment.  We are looking to improve our overall services still better.  Definitely we are improving a lot and we look forward for your next stay so that you can experience it.  Regards Hotel Manager.

Summary: I needed a hotel for a quick stop this past weekend and price was an important factor. After checking around I selected the Super 8 in Westminster.   The hotel wasn't much to look at when we drove up. It's obviously a low cost building but the staff was nice and the rooms were better than expected. Clean and well kept and with obviously new beds.   The area wasn't great being right off ether freeway but parking was good and the property seemed safe. They have cameras everywhere just in case which made us feel secure.   I was expecting a poor experience but left well rested and suprised. I would stay there again. The property is definitely cut rate but probably the best in the price range for miles around.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for commenting. I’m very pleased that you found our staff so friendly and accommodating. We take real pride in enhancing the guest experience with the best possible customer service, and I’m please we can serve you. I hope you will be able to stay with us again soon. It would be an honor to serve you again.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: I started coming here a few years ago! It is a clean, well kept motel, right on the border of Huntington Beach and Westminster. The Freeway is close so that makes everywhere a little closer. The place is well kept with some upgrades and renovations going on. New windows and furniture. It is modestly priced with no huge resort taxes like neighboring cities. It is close to the beach, Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. The staff is great! especially at the desk, Jason, Dave and MJ, they will go out of their way to help and assist you! They have a small pool for the kids. The rooms smell fresh and clean, The maintenance staff does a great job too! In and out of the room, I highly recommend it! You get a very nice place at very reasonable price.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m sorry that several issues combined to make your stay less than desirable. We take real pride in offering the best possible guest experience, and I understand that we let you down. You can be sure we’ll do better for you next time. Nothing means more to us than providing a pleasant guest experience.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Obviously family run.  Stayed 3 nights for location and price.  Clean updated room, asked for extra towels and delivered in two minutes. Standard breakfast and super friendly staff.  next to freeway and old strip mall- better than it looked driving by at 45mph. Teeny pool but not there to swim 5 stars as clean, kind and can't be beat at price
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for staying with us. I’m very glad that our hotel impressed you in so many ways. We focus on offering a guest experience that will satisfy a wide range of travelers. When you’re in the area again, I hope you will make us your first choice. We’ll be here when you need us with another great stay that you’re sure to like again.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Horrific employees, creepy feel, bad element of people surrounding the place, the pool is more like a dirty jacuzzi, and we got locked out of our bathroom several times, due to a broken lock.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m sorry that several issues combined to make your stay less than desirable. We take real pride in offering the best possible guest experience, and I understand that we let you down. You can be sure we’ll do better for you next time. Nothing means more to us than providing a pleasant guest experience.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: This place was just ok, we only stayed here because the value was good.  The room is what you'd expect from any motel, just clean and comfortable enough to sleep in, but not to spend a day lounging in.  The grounds aren't great, and the pool was filthy.  The area also isn't the safest, so don't leave your belongings in the car.  In the end, though, I'd only stay here again if I was able to get a really good deal.  Otherwise, best to spend a few extra bucks and stay somewhere nicer up the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for taking time to offer your comments. I'm glad we met your needs while you were in our area, but I apologize that we did not exceed your expectations and fell short in some ways. We take pride in providing a lodging experience that everyone will enjoy, and I regret that we didn't provide you with complete satisfaction. I hope we will still be your first choice in this area in the future, and I hope we can do better for you next time.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Breakfast could be little more verity, in room wifi and internet should be stronger signals. I even could not check in my flight from room, other wise costumer services are very friendly and great welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m pleased you had a good experience with us although I regret that we couldn’t completely satisfy you because you didn't like the free breakfast and experience a temporary problem with our free wifi. We take real pride in our hotel, and I apologize if we let you down in any ways. We want you to have the best possible experience here, and we’re working toward complete satisfaction of all guests.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: It is ok for a short stay a night or two. Parking is very limited so is the breakfast room. The toilet flush is so loud it would wake everyone up.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m pleased you had a good experience with us although I regret that we couldn’t completely satisfy you. We take real pride in our hotel, and I apologize if we let you down in any ways. We want you to have the best possible experience here, and we’re working toward complete satisfaction of all guests.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Jason at the front desk was incredible!  Put me in a room that matched my needs. Loved the convenience of this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for being among our many satisfied guests. So often, only those with an issue or complaint bother to comment, and your positive feedback means a lot to us. Our team reads all comments and we are all inspired by your positive, upbeat assessments of our hotel. You can be sure we'll be here for you in the future with another great experience whenever you need us. Thanks again.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Older but clean hotel.  Located in a high traffic area with plenty of near by restaurants.  Not the best part of town but seemed safe.  Their beds were excellent and room was very clean.  Good value.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for staying with us. I’m very glad that our hotel impressed you in so many ways. We focus on offering a guest experience that will satisfy a wide range of travelers. When you’re in the area again, I hope you will make us your first choice. We’ll be here when you need us with another great stay that you’re sure to like again.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: The room was dirty, beds uncomfortable, could not connect to internet, breakfast choices were very poor.  If it wasn't for exhaustion, we would have never stayed.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your opinions. I’m terribly sorry that we failed to meet your needs and did not live up to your expectations. We take pride in our hotel and in providing a great place to stay for so many guests, and I deeply regret that we let you down. Perhaps you will give us another try in the future so we can do a better job of satisfying you. We’re always working to get better.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: For the price, I would stay there again.  The room was clean and the staff were friendly.  It's an  older hotel but the owners have done a decent job keeping it up.  There were several families there for a soccer tournament.   Parking can be tight but I did not have any problems.

This was a good place to stay for a short visit. First of all, after a long flight I got to the hotel about 4 hours before check in.  I asked if I could check in early, but was told that the room wasn't ready yet.  But the front desk person, I forgot the guy's name, but the was very helpful, said I could precheck in, give him my contact number and when the room was available would call me.  I was very pleased when about 45 minutes later, he called me to say the room was ready and I could come in.  The entire stay was good, room was good, service was good.  The staff was friendly every morning making the stay enjoyable.  In this case hats off to that guy at the front desk, he should be commended for his customer service, unfortunately I forgot his name, sometimes they say first

Summary Heading: Good for a single night with late arrival and early departure
Summary: Room was not clean.  Clothes from previous guest were on the floor in a corner.  Cleaning rags were left on furniture.  While a non-smoking property, the smell of smoke was prevalent.    Bottom sheet only covered 3/4 of bed.  Requested correct sheets, not done.  We had to remake the bed and better position the sheet to cover more of the bed area.   Internet was not reliable.  We were dropped while using the system and had to log in again, even though we had logged in only a short time earlier.  Breakfast was only carbs, not even fruit.  Stocking was not regular.  Availability seemed to be random on when someone remembered to restock food items.  Front desk personal were friendly.  They were willing to help, but could only do so much.

Summary Heading: Our go to motel after surgery
Summary: My BF/partner + I have been staying at the Super 8 in Westminster in conjunction w/ my out-patient spinal surgeries at St. Joseph's in Orange + appts w/ my spinal specialist for almost 1.5 yrs. It is a short drive by surface streets to + from this area plus easy access to I-405. This Super 8 offers the ADA NS rooms w/ the safety bars + bench in the shower which I need at a reasonable rate. The only problem is the water from the shower flows into the rest of the bathroom + presents a fall risk, which is dangerous for someone like me with severe spinal conditions. There's also a mini fridge/freezer for keeping the ice packs I need for my neck + back frozen or cold. There's a modest continental breakfast including 2 cereals, milk, oj, coffee, + packaged danish. The property isn't
Overall I had a good experience here. Didn't spend much time in the room, besides sleeping and showering. But my children and I were comfortable.
Stayed on the 4th floor on the Beach Blvd side and the road noise was very bad all night long Extremely hard to get a good nights sleep.

The first room they put us in was totally dirty. It had used water bottles all over the place. The first night we were there something happened in the strip mall that the hotel was in and there were cops and police tape everywhere. Overall, when we got our clean room, it was ok. The staff were excellent but I wouldn't stay there by myself.

• Limited/Super small parking lot • Super noisy as neighboring g "loitered, planted and hung out" • Super transient it  • Super poorly laid out (open guestroom door anyone can see you sleeping in bed) • Guestroom was DIRECTLY in front of elevator  • Super lengthy wait times for elevator access • Staff denied single noise complaint sufficed -- Staff said multiple calls were required to take an appropriate action  Lacked customary Wyndam hospitality standards -- sub par service and accommodations
It was a pleasant stay and the service was great when we checked in. During checkout it was not the greatest. Also, the breakfast was very small. Had the bare minimum.
We liked our stay, and we would stay again. The staff was very helpful in getting me a downstairs room, sense I do have only one leg.
so cordial relations . Coffee was like refilted from yesterday, so diluted. Refrigerator in my room is rattling loud and disturbing my sleep.

This hotel does charge a $100 deposit up front. The rooms were renovated which was nice but the wood floors are cold during the winter months. Those wall heaters are useless at keeping the room at a warm temp. The pillows were old but the bed was alright. Not enough working outlets. TV had a decent channel selection.   On the whole I had a rather quiet stay and had no major issues.

Summary Heading: O.K.for an overnighter, but wouldn't recommend for longer.
Summary: TV was out when we arrived but was back on by evening. Bed was uncomfortable. Breakfast was minimal. Single serving coffee maker in the room didn't get the coffee hot, flavor was OK. Otherwise the room was comfortable, bathroom was clean and well supplied, staff was friendly and accommodating.

Summary Heading: The rooms are clean & most of them have been renovated. The...
Summary: The rooms are clean & most of them have been renovated. The staff is friendly. It would be an added plus if the checkout time was 12 noon vs 11 a.m. or if they provided a late check-out until noon like most other hotels.

Upon arriving at the hotel, we were concerned about the neighborhood and highway. Per our email request we were on the top floor and away from the traffic. We found our room clean, and comfortable. Our room was quiet. Other than the elevator clunking at the 3rd floor. everything was what we expected.

The $76 room rate was refreshing compared to the $150+ we paid at Best Western in San Diego a few days before, but I think we got what we paid for. The room had average / above average cleanliness and decor, but gazing down at the TINY swimming pool from the 3rd floor room gave away how filthy it was. On the way the breakfast, the trash can next to the 3rd floor elevator had been tipping over and nasty stuff was spread all over (by an animal or an guest with animal tendencies?) We let the front desk person know immediately and when we returned from breakfast, it was still there and when we checked out it was still there.  Who knows, it maybe still is.  Continental breakfast was joke- they might as well had a bowl of Cheetos on the counter.  My advise- spend the extra $20 and

room was poorly kept. Carpet was dirty, worn. Old television cabinet was left in the room after the TV was mounted to the wall. Threshold to the restroom was loose, a tripping hazard.  Bathroom was the nicest part of the room. The attendant was a gem.  He could easily represent a 4 or 5 star hotel.  He tried to mak our stay as comfortable as possible.  Hotwire.com is Horrible! Poorest customer service I've ever experienced.

For the price, just a place to sleep. Cigarette smoke coming from bathroom vent both days we stayed there. Carpet was worn and filthy, I know they did not want to replace it, but they could have cleaned it. I don,t blame the staff, they only do what they are told by management.

I travel to Huntington Beach a lot, and it is always a pleasure to stay here. The desk gentleman are always helpful and friendly and help me in anyway they can. Even during the busy times I find they keep things clean and quiet. I always enjoy my stay.

The Hotel Staff was as friendly as they get, overall very clean and the bed was comfortable. Also very quiet, no disturbances the entire two weeks I was there. Breakfast wasn't anything to get excited about but it sufficed. Convenient to a lot of places. I would definitely stay here again.

Elevator broke then and come to find out it still is.isn't there some law that states they must have a working elevator of a 4 story hotel of that size.I do not see on the front page on their website that it is broke. What a bunch of cheapskates.someone  should report them.if they have it listed as something they have then they should provide or take the elevator off of their list of things they have.parts do not take that long.CHEAPSKATES...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m terribly sorry that a difficult-to-repair and temporary failure of our elevator caused you so much concern. We take pride in our hotel and in providing the best possible guest experience, and it’s unfortunate the repair took longer than expected. I hope you find accommodations more suited to your needs the next time you’re in the area.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: When I booked this room thru World Mark I wasn't away that the elevator was down.  We checked in at 12:30 a.m. and the night clerk didn't speak clear English and refused to speak into the microphone so I could hear him, he wasn't very friendly, The breakfast was less than desirable, with frozen waffles, and 2 cereal choices. It didn't have a mini fridge, or a microwave, and only 1 ice maker on the very bottom floor, while we were on the 4th floor.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m sorry that several issues combined to make your stay less than desirable. We take real pride in offering the best possible guest experience, and I understand that we let you down. You can be sure we’ll do better for you next time. Nothing means more to us than providing a pleasant guest experience.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: This property is ok. Very clean but the elevator wasn't working so up 4 flights of stairs. They did refund 1/2 of my nights stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m sorry that you stayed with us while the elevator was malfunctioning. This is very unfortunate, and while the problem was difficult to solve, it has been corrected. I apologize to you once again, and I’m pleased we were able to compensate you for this inconvenience. You can be sure we’ll be here for you when you need a clean place to stay in the future.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: TIRED - NEED A BED AND A SHOWER
Summary: If you are tired and need a clean bed, hot shower that is near the freeway, this is the place to stay.  Unpretentious, clean room, parking, liquor store within 20 giant steps, then book this motor hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your kind words about our clean, comfortable and friendly hotel. We take serving our guests very seriously and are very pleased that we met your needs so well. I hope you will tell others about our property and stay with us again the next time you’re in town. We appreciate the opportunity to serve you.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: Ok so the price was fine and last year we stayed down the street in a nicer hotel So we figured the area was fine. Nope, right behind a liquor Store, pawnshop and "Beach Girls"  But fine, whatever . Then the elevator was broken. we stayed on the 4th floor. But again, it was fine. Coming back at night we were constantly approached by people in the parking lot. Prostitutes were actually outside.   The room was musky, my mother and kids all came down with a cough. I was worried when I Saw a moldy door in their dumpster. the rooms were old but still, that was ok, until I saw they were trying to debit a 40.00 deposit from me saying I broke a chair. When I called and asked they said they had photos. But that you wouldn't be able to see it because its on the inside.  Im not one to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m terribly sorry that we failed to meet your expectations in some ways. We take real pride in this hotel and believe that pride shows in everything we do. I’m disappointed that we could not satisfy you, and I hope you will try us again in the future. We’re always working to make the guest experience better than ever before.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Next to a bar and a liquor store
Summary: Bar was too loud and too many people outside the liquor store and bar ...no parking for Super 8 guests all parking spots were taking by the bar customers..over all the motel it self needed a upgrade...carpet was stained and old ...furniture was old...had a very nice tv..the refrigerator was old .. front desk was helpful and nice..
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m terribly sorry that we didn’t meet your expectations. We take pride in providing a great experience to all guests and have a good relationship with our neighbors as well. I apologize sincerely for any ways we failed you. I hope you will focus on the many good about our hotel, including our friendly staff and great televisions, and make us your first choice when you return to Westminster.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: I had a wonderful time here.  The room was nice, clean and spacious.  I loved the appointments.  Staff were unfailingly courteous and helpful.  Best of all, it was affordable and centrally located.  Cannot wait to stay at the Wyndham on Nob Hill sometime in my lifetime!!!!!!!

Summary Heading: At this time they are having safety work done on their...
Summary: At this time they are having safety work done on their elevator, but they continue to help and work around it and make my stay still enjoyable,

Summary Heading: Kind & helpful innkeeper & staff; more than adequate
Summary: My bf & I stayed there following a surgery I had at St. Joseph's Hospital in Orange. I was in pain; the innkeeper kindly allowed us to check in early w/ my prescribed service dog. The bed was comfy, it was quiet & we enjoyed a much needed good night's sleep. There was a flat screen TV mounted to the wall that worked great, a frig & microwave, & the A/C worked well, too. The continental breakfast was convenient & sufficient for us. We had raisin bran w/ milk, yogurt, OJ, coffee, & single-packaged raisin danishes which tasted best warmed up in the microwave. The innkeeper also double-checked our google map directions & offered an add'l tip which cut off even more time on our return drive. The built in seat in the shower deflected water onto the entire bathroom floor, which was an

Was at Super 8 for 1 night. The room and bathroom were clean and the staff were polite and pleasant.  Despite being on a very busy street it was quiet.  I have family close by and will definitely be using this motel another time.

I was really surprised at how clean the hotel was.  I have never stayed at a Super 8 before but stayed because it was at a convenient location.  However, I had very low expectations.    The hotel offered a "continental  breakfast "  which was much better than expected.  Although it offered the usual cereal, the milk that went with it was very cold and fresh.  The coffee was a little weak but everything else was great.  The only fresh fruit served were oranges but they were delicious.  Frankly, the oranges were sufficient.  How many people really eat apples for breakfast?  I would stay at a Super 8 again.

We usually stay at a Super 8 when we travel and had chosen the one in Westminster when we came to Huntington Beach for the marathon. We stayed three nights. The guy at front desk in the lobby was very helpful and checked which of the rooms were ready so we could check in before time (which is 3 p.m.) even though we were there before noon.  The room was the typical Super 8, including a fridge and a microwave as well as a coffee machine. The wash basin had a hair dryer. The room was perfectly clean, but the furniture a bit, well, middle-aged. In this context the carpet was definitely elderly, a bit threadbare and with a stain. The appliances in the bathroom and at the wash basin were all on good order and everything worked well. The bed was good and we slept very well in it. There
Hotel was easy to reach by car and had many of the conveniences that I needed; refridg, coffee maker, hair dryer.
Service is excellent, courteous front desk personnel. Parking space is very open and limited thus reducing our sense of security.

The place needs attention.  Our room had stains on the rug.  The elevator looked and felt like it was on its last leg.  The place just looks beat up.  Positives: The hotel is a few minutes from the beach, breakfast, microwave, refrigerator, and price.  I would not stay at this particular Super 8 again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m terribly sorry that we failed to meet your expectations in some ways. We take real pride in this hotel and believe that pride shows in everything we do. I’m disappointed that we could not satisfy you, and I hope you will try us again in the future. We’re always working to make the guest experience better than ever before.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I stay in hotels quite often and super 8 for the most part has everything we need!!!

Summary Heading: I enjoyed my stay at Super 8 Westminster
Summary: I stayed here for 6 nights and I was treated kindly by the hotel staff esp.the front desk guys. They are very accomodating and I felt like I'm at my own home. The rooms are modestly clean and the scent is very fresh when you first open the door. I can't ask for a better place to stay it's Super 8. I'll be back here definitely.

Summary Heading: Horrible surprise- fire sprinklers goes off unexpectedly in night!
Summary: We stayed at this very worn and rather run down hotel for 5 nights in late August. Don't go there! They had a fire alarm go off and fire sprinklers poured down water into our room. No apologies and no explanations. No discounted price either. I will never stay there again. They don't care about their guests.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I apologize again to you for the problem with the fire sprinklers caused by another guest. I can personally assure you that such an incident had never happened before, and we’ve taken action to make sure it doesn’t happen again. The problem that led to this happening has been resolved. If there are any outstanding issues you feel are not resolved, please contact me directly.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: The lighting to get to room was not adequate for late night arrival. The overall hotel was pretty run down and outdated

I have stayed at many super 8 and this one did need some updates. Pros: Close to beach with out the steep price. sleeping in the bed was like sleeping at home. Comfortable. Room was clean. plenty of towels. No street noise or people walking by our rooms at all times. Cons: small selection for breakfast. Stained Carpets in room, swimming pool needs alot more attention. over all had a great time and would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I’m so pleased you had a great stay and a nice time with us. We look forward to having you with us again. I’m sorry that the breakfast, provided for free, wasn’t to your liking and that you noticed a few other shortcomings. We’re always changing and improving and will take these comments into consideration as we get better and better.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: I have stayed at many Super 8 facilities and this one is average. Pros:  Great Customer Service; Great Shower; Central Location. Cons:  Not many choices for breakfast items; loud street noise.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your kind words. I’m pleased that you noticed our great customer service, our excellent showers and our convenient location. I apologize, however, that the free breakfast we provide wasn’t to your liking and that you noticed some street noise. I hope you won’t let these small issues keep you from staying with us again.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome customer service and great price!!
Summary: Jay, the hotel manager was very friendly and professional in our stay at the super 8! Great price and only 10-15 mins away from Huntington Beach! This is our second time staying here. It's close to shopping, food and not too far from knotts berry farm! The hotel has had some nice upgrades to its checkin breakfast area. The rooms aren't fancy but are clean and affordable which is all that really matters.
Please give a raise to the sweet woman and man (I did not get their names) who offered us towels. They are so hardworking and deserve it!

While this motel was comfortable and apparently clean (although there was a cockroach in my bathroom), I would not want to walk in the neighborhood after dark.  It is adjacent to and surrounded by a number of small, slightly sleazy businesses that have customers I don't care to be around.  There is minimal motel parking available  in an area not shared with these customers.  Low water pressure made for a disappointing shower.  The breakfast area has limited seating but since the breakfast itself is better avoided, this is not a problem.  The virtues are easy access from/to an expressway (I405) and relatively inexpensive for that part of California.  Room charges are made in advance, not at checkout, so don't change your mind after your first night.

The staff at this Super 8 was very nice, but they didn't have much to work with. Mold in the room, run down facility, creepy guy lingering by the elevator... it was gross. I was given 50% off (I discovered these issues too late to change rooms) but that doesn't make up for the disgusting accommodations.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. I’m very sorry that we could not meet your expectations during your stay, but I’m glad you found the staff so accommodating and that we were able to make it up to you. We strive for complete satisfaction of all customers, and we obviously failed you in this case. For that, I sincerely apologize.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: The room smelt like smoke, the towels had stains on them and the night guy was rude. When we called they said it was 7 miles away from are current location it was actually 18 miles away with a 30 min drive. Super 8 sucked!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. We use all comments in our continuous improvement efforts. I’m sorry that there was a misunderstanding involving the directions and that there were housekeeping and staffing issues that detracted so much from your stay. I sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectation on this occasion. We value your business and hope you will try us again when in the area.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: One of the employees were really rude, it was extremely...
Summary: One of the employees were really rude, it was extremely noisy at night and in the morning. I rate it below average. Overall, I wish I had choose a different place. I stayed here last year and there was so problem at all.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for being a repeat guest. I’m sorry that staffing issue and an issue involving other guests detracted from your most recent stay. We do our best to satisfy all customers, and we sincerely apologize that we missed the mark in this case. We use all comments as part of our continuous improvement process, so you can be sure these comments will make a difference.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Check In was after 3:00 PM we checked in around 3:45 PM, we went to the room and it wasn't even cleaned yet, trash, bed not made, room was dirty. We went back to the office and was provided another room, the second room was good to go, but the first impression of this stay was not what you really want.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your stay with us earlier this year. I’m very sorry that a simple mix up involving which room you were assigned detracted so much from your stay. We use all comments to help us improve, and your concerns have been addressed with the desk and housekeeping staff. I hope you will stay with us again when in the area again. I can assure you that this sort of problem won’t happen again.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: The hotel is small, on a very busy street but access to the freeway (405) was a good thing. The hotel is under some minor construction, so there was warning tape and other equipment on the premise. During check-in the computer system went down which means our reservation & rate couldn't be confirmed. The staff was very pleasant and lucky for me I had a copy of my confirmation which came in handy and moved the process along. The room was big and a little dated (carpet, drapes, A/C unit) but it was clean enough to overlook. Shocking thing was the window was 'frosted' so you couldn't see out nor could anyone see in, so there was NO view of anything. King size bed was a plus (needed more then 3 pillows) and the bathroom was cool (more then 2 sets of towels would have been nice). Oh
The place was in a good location to stores and services  The beds were hard but ok There was a lot of construction going on at the office  Rooms could have cleaned beter
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your stay with us when we were improving the hotel earlier this year. We appreciate having you as a guest. We satisfy many guests every night, but I’m sincerely sorry that you did not find the bed as comfortable as you would have liked. We will take this comment into consideration when making future improvements.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Clean and close to the beach. Meets every need I have. The manager and clerk are always very friendly and always very helpful. Very affordable too.

Summary Heading: Made reservations over the phone so didn't know what to...
Summary: Made reservations over the phone so didn't know what to expect but was satisfied with the location and service.  If I had to stay there again I would.
even with Construction going on in the lobby the staff got me checked in right away very helpfull. rooms are big and clean.

Summary Heading: nice location but breakfast needs to be improved
Summary: nice hotel and nice location if you are visiting Huntington beach, rooms and not great but reasonable, swimming pool  is poor and breakfast is poor, but according to the price you can say it is average hotel, less than a mile there is bella terra plaza you can find every thing there and on the other side you will find target super market witch i like to book a hotel near to it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking time to comment about our hotel. I appreciate both the positive and negatives comments you made. We believe we are a well-located and nice hotel with great amenities, and I hope you do to. We’re also improving every day, so we are quite a lot nicer than when you left your comments. If we fell short of complete satisfaction during your stay, I sincerely apologize.   Thanks again,  Hotel Manager.

Summary: Reservation system worked fine.  Front desk courteous and efficient.  Room on the large side and clean.  TV on the small side but adequate.  Maid service quick and efficient.  All in all, a good bargain.

As other reviews have noted, this motel shares a parking area with a "bikini bar", so arriving at night, I was already wondering about the sobriety of people I might encounter in the parking lot.  The clerk at check-in was all business, no smiles, but accommodating; when I asked for a quiet room, he gave me a room on the third floor toward the back of the building. The room turned out to be fairly quiet, but you can still hear the whir of vehicles on the 405.  I was very disappointed when I walked into the room, the carpet was dingy and stained, and the room had a stale odor.  I would have requested a different room, but I was tired and it was already getting late, so I decided to deal with it for just the one night I was staying.  Luckily, the room had a window which opened and
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We can’t do anything about our neighbors, but we are working every day to make this property nicer. We’ve made quite a lot of improvements in furnishings since your stay and have also retrained our housekeeping staff on how to keep our rooms up to our standards. I sincerely apologize if we fell short of your standards in any way. I hope you’ll visit again and see how we’re changing.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary: Other than the inconvenience of changing rooms late at night because the air conditioner was not working , I think I will stay again Hotel location is good there is Restaurants/Shopping Center and I405 close by.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I’m very sorry that you experienced a problem with the air conditioner during your stay, but I’m glad we were able to quickly place you in another room. We have rechecked and repaired all AC units since your stay and are proud to report that they are all working better than ever. I apologize, however, that you were inconvenienced. I appreciate your positive comments and hope we will be welcoming you again soon.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary: The location is great for the price.  It's really close to the Huntington Beaches.  It's also just down the road from Knott's Berry Farm.  We were able to get on the freeway and head up to LA for the day to the Citadel mall to do some shopping before going over to a Dodgers game.  We were also able to go down to Newport Beach and Balboa.  So I would say this was a great central location for our family for the things we wanted to do.  We would stay there again. The hotel is fine.  Nothing great but no complaints.  The pool is teeny tiny.

I was surprised by some bad reviews for this. I stayed here with a friend whilst travelling California and it done the job nicely, value was good, staff was very friendly and room was pretty good. Location is probably not the best, but this didn't bother us as we were driving and not staying for long. But overall pretty happy with our stay here.

Summary Heading: Different to what we normally would stay at
Summary: We stayed at this hotel purely for convenience as it was close to a soccer tournament our boys team was competing in.  This is NOT the sort of hotel you want to take young teenage kids to. There is a liquor store AND a bikini cocktail bar right next door. They share the same parking lot as the hotel. Girls clad in bikinis work the cocktail bar.  People hung around outside at the liquor store until early morning and we could smell pot coming from one of the hotel rooms. The maid said it was from a girl who checked in a week ago but had a different man at the room each night.   There were lots of ants all over the place especially downstairs by the pool area and along the sidewalk in front of the lobby area.  They crawled up the wheel well of the car while we were checking in.

Summary Heading: for shower need better high pressure shower head , lighting...
Summary: for shower need better high pressure shower head , lighting must be brighter in the room . we're back next week maybe stay there!!!!!!

Summary Heading: Good value for money.  Attention to detail in the room care...
Summary: Good value for money.  Attention to detail in the room care could improve.  Very good breakfast assortment available.

Summary Heading: The person at check in was horrible. Said probably two...
Summary: The person at check in was horrible. Said probably two things to me "have reservation" and "your room is # ___". Very unwelcoming. Had I not made a reservation online I would've gone to another hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments about our customer service. In the time since your stay, we have replaced many staff members and retrained others to make sure we’re living up to the level of customer service you should expect from a Super 8 motel. Our goal is to offer 100 percent satisfaction in every way to every guest. I sincerely apologize that you were treated discourteously and hope you’ll come see how we’ve changed when you’re in the area again.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary: Great location, comfortable rooms, large refrigerator with freezer, microwave and coffee along with cont. breakfast are the highlights.

Summary Heading: Ok hotel for the money but can be better
Summary: We stayed here because our 1st choice was not available + it was listed on the AAA tour book.  AAA only listed recommended hotels so this was why we stayed here instead of looking for somewhere else.  The check-in process was easy enough.  We were allowed to check in at arrival time of around 2PM instead of the official 3PM and were given 10% AAA discount as promised.  Room has Wi-fi, microwave, and refrig.  Hotel and rooms are dated with old tube tv.  We found several long hairs on a supposedly new pilow so we ended up threw it on the floor.  New towels had visible stain spots which grossed out my g/f so she didn't use them at all.  Room is next to the busy street so it is a bit noisy but we prefer it over distant rooms.  We did not use tiny breakfast room right in the front of
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for offering an assessment of our Super 8 motel in Westminster, CA. I’m sorry that we did not completely live up to your standards, but I appreciate you also pointing out the positive things about your stay. We have recently retrained all housekeeping staff to make sure rooms are spotless, and we are also improving fixtures and furnishings as time and booking gaps allow. Our goal is a great overall experience for everyone. For the ways we fell short in your case, I apologize again.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: It's OK value for the money
Summary: Super noisy location - people coming and going all night. Lots of street traffic noise. Also, in our room (311) you had to pull the door partially open in order to flip the deadbolt.

for a decent priced hotel this was good. ok continental breakfast. maid sprayed a strong room spray that lasted till next day, and gave us a headache. it is convenient to family. have stayed here before, and will stay here again.

Summary Heading: The staff is really nice.Really enjoy the continental...
Summary: The staff is really nice. Really enjoy the continental breakfast. There was a bit of an odor but as soon as i turned the air on it went away The areas not the best but the rooms are nice they have microwaves and refrigerator in them.
Good value for an occasional stay. Microwave oven is useful. Decent room size. Bed are not firm enough. Refrigerator not cold enough.

Nothing fancy but perfect for our 1 night stay. Clean, close to amenities and Huntington, friendly staff. Will be staying again when in area. We have small kids and it was fine. Only drawback is the swanky bar next door but we weren't hanging outside late at night and felt safe enough.
I stayed at this hotel 2 nights, the security was very good. They clean the room everyday. Good Hotel. I will come back again and recommend this hotel to my friends.

Excellent hotel and I have stayed at this location many times.    High quality hotel for a great price.   I could have stayed in a higher end hotel on company expenses but I chose Super 8 because the rate is good and the rooms are always comfortable.

The only complaint I had was being charged for the 1st night for our 5th room that was reserved. I explained to the desk worker that we had 5 people with flight delays who were now going to arrive the following day, but I was told sorry we have to charge you for the 1st night anyway. Every time I've had an issue like this arise the hotel waived the charge due to it not being our fault for flight issues. We had 6 rooms for 5 nights so I felt the hotel could have worked with us on the extra charge.

We visited and had a room for a week. We initially had some trouble accessing the Wi-Fi. Management quickly helped us and after that our connection was perfect. Breakfast was good with a lot of choices that allowed us to not have to go out and have more time to get ready for the seminar. Close to everything and the beach was beautiful at Huntington Beach. We would stay her again and recommend it highly.
The staff here went out of their way to assist me with everything.  The location was perfect for us, and there is so much variety in restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

My company sends me places and has me stay in rather nice hotels that have all the comforts of, well, nice hotels. This was a personal trip so my budget was tighter. I walked away from a Ramada that refused the price on my reservation and found this great place. It's near a freeway, maybe 1/2 mile from major stores (like a Barnes & Noble) and restaurants. And the room was great!   The room was larger than I expected, especially for the price. In addition to the beds there was an easy chair, and the normal wall desk. The bathroom was separate so it was private. And the part of the bathroom with the tub/shower and toilet actually had a fan so that steam from the shower (and other reasons for a fan) was removed. So different from most hotels!   A free, small continental breakfast

Summary Heading: Ok  hotel.  Stayed here only one night.  Big rooms.  Old...
Summary: Ok  hotel.  Stayed here only one night.  Big rooms.  Old furniture.  Freeway noise prevalent.  There was a cleaner used that permeated the room - not good. Again, just an ok hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for comment about our hotel and noting how spacious our rooms are. I’m very sorry, however, that we did not completely live up to your needs. Our goal is 100 percent satisfaction for every client. We have made some updates since you stayed with us, so you will find a nicer experience if you choose to stay with us again. I look forward to serving you again, and I again apologize that we weren’t what you expected at the time of your visit.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: we have stayed in all the really nice hotels near...
Summary: we have stayed in all the really nice hotels near Disneyland and they were nice but your rooms were just as nice for alot less money which makes it possible to come again and again.  The outside eh could be better but it was fine we did not sleep outside lol.  Our room was very clean the bathroom not a spot to be found and I look for that.  So thank you so much for having a nice clean place to stay at an affordable price we will be back. Mr. and Mrs. G

I needed a place quickly after a competing hotel refused the rate I was given. Super 8 was perfect. The desk clerk was friendly. The room spacious and clean. It even had a breakfast in the morning. Great value!

Summary Heading: nice hotel , fairly priced, good service
Summary: only stayed one night, but was please with hotel ,good fair price clean room I will stay there again.

I stayed 4 nights with my family (4 adult and 2 kids). The room looked good. I liked large granite lavabo, and bathroom was very clean.  The things I didn't like was the carpet which looked so old, and the color of the sheet set which made me feel bad about cleanliness; although I knew that they changed linens and cleaned up the room everyday.  The heat/ air conditioner was old too. Its sound was very loud when turned on, but I though it's Ok for 2 star hotel (better than no heat/air conditioner ^_^) I needed a night-lamp, for I couldn't sleep without them, but there was not. It'll be nice if the hotel could have night-lamp for each room. (This idea is not so expensive to do, but it'll give the hotel more credit) The breakfast was so so; you should be very careful to check the
The hotel is clean and there is plenty of parking space.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  I have been here several times and will return again.

I didn't see any sign that breakfast was offered, nor was I told that it was available.  In fact, there was NO coffee or tea setup in the lobby.  It would have been nice to at least have some coffee before I departed.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for commenting about our hotel. Breakfast is offered on the posted schedule, and I’m very sorry that was not communicated to you. Much has changed and improved at our hotel since your stay, and I hope you’ll join us again so you can see for yourself how we’re getting better day by day. Again, I apologize that we did not meet your expectations at the time of your stay.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: "No Sympathy, No Hospitality, and NO LATE CHECK OUT"
Summary: My husband,  young boys and myself arrived at Super 8 on a Thursday for 3 nights.  I was happy with the evening clerk that checked me in.  He was pleasant and the check in process was quick.  Our room was clean and up to date with tasteful modern furnishings.  I was intending to write a pretty good review for this motel until check out time approached.  My older son, almost 4, was not feeling well and needed my extra TLC which of course set me behind packing our things to meet the 11am check out time.  Well, I thought I would call the front desk to let the motel know that I needed an extra 45 minutes to check out.  When I called a lady answered and told me she could only give me 30 minutes extra and if I was past 11:30 then she would charge my credit card on file.  I informed
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks very much for taking time to comment about our hotel. I’m very sorry that our customer service was not up to our usual standards during your stay. Since that time, we have made a number of changes and improvements at the hotel, including staffing changes and retraining. We think if you visit us again you’ll find a much better experience, and we look forward to welcoming you when you’re in the area again. I sincerely apologize for the trouble you had during this visit.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary: This motel is very good with a fair price.  We would definitely do a return visit should we return to this area.  The carpet was well used, but we found it to be clean.  Everything else was neat and very clean.  It had a microwave, refridgerator, and coffee maker in the room.  The staff was very helpful and courteous to us.  The Continental Breakfast had a fair amount to choose from and quite adequate.  I would recommend to anyone who is looking for good value for money.

JAY, the manager was very helpful.  the location seemed to be a bit "questionable", but it turned out to be just fine, and the night staff(some guy) assured us that we were in a safe neighborhood. At first we had a room where the toilet was broken.  We were offered another room, however, the night staff (some guy) thought he was being helpful by showing us that the toilet wasn't really broken, and all we had to do was take the lid off of the toilet and attach the toilet handle to the flushing thingy.  gross.  We took the other room.

This clean Super 8 is close to the highway and Little Saigon (Vietnamese supermarkets and restaurants). It was reasonably priced. I called to book 1 extra night prior to what was booked through Expedia and they were good about it and gave me the same rate. Although it is close to the strip mall with a bar but no worries my rental car was always where it should be. Breakfast area is quite small just across from the reception. The rooms were clean. This location is ideal if you would like to visit the beaches (Manhattan, Hermosa, Redondo), Palo Verdes and San Diego areas. That's what we did.

Summary Heading: A Really Pleasant Find While Passing Through!
Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here when we were driving along on a roadtrip around the USA and it started to get dark. We decided to take a random highway exit and came across this place.  I rushed into the reception to check prices and after hearing they were quite low, and receiving really friendly service from the woman behind the desk, I went out to the car to tell my girlfriend that I'd book us a night.  Despite us dropping in at night and looking for a last minute room, the woman behind the desk was really warm and welcoming. We were given a discounted king room which was quite large with a clean bathroom. The WiFi worked fine.  We also used the laundry at the motel which was fine, and noticed a decent yet small fitness room and hot tub (unfortunately we didn't have time to

Smelly and in poor condition. Blankets were stained as were the sheets and there was a huge burn hole in the blanket. I really think the bar next door was filled with working girls that were spilling into the parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It has been some time now since your visit, and many aspects of the hotel have changed and improved. I only wish we had been able to provide a nicer experience during your time with us. While we can’t do much about the neighbors, we can and have made improvements to the facility itself. I sincerely apologize that your stay was not up to your standards, and I hope you’ll try us again if you’re ever in the area again.   Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: Decent for business travelers, great for adults who want a low-cost, clean room
Summary: This Super 8 is very well run and always well kept.  The beds are comfortable. I feel very safe at this location compared to what the other reviewer mentioned. It is clean, there is all the amenities in the room - coffee, tea, dryer, tv, microwave, refrigerator, alarm clock.  It is close to the 405 but far enough that you don't hear any noise from it. Free wifi from your room.

Summary Heading: HORRIFIC!!!!!!!!!!!!!! DO NOT BRING YOUR FAMILY HERE!!!!
Summary: If I could give this a more negative rating I would! This place is smack dab in the middle of the ghetto! Right next door to a strip mall with a bar, pool hall, pawn, shop, liquor store and strip club! The lobby closes at 9 and the clerk will only speak to you rudely thru bars and bullet proof glass!The rooms are vile and were not properly reconditioned after the hotel became non smoking, now it just reeks of ashtray and bad air freshener. The pictures are photoshopped I think because it doesn't look like that! Take this Moms warning, don't go!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing Super 8 Westminster for your recent stay in our area.  Thank you for giving us a review, it is very much appreciated.  Upon receipt of your review, the following actions were taken:  • Desk clerk received additional training in the courteous manner in which you, our valued guest, are to be treated.  • Housekeeping received additional training in the level of cleanliness required of them as our employees.  I hope that the next time you visit our area, you will once again choose to stay at Super 8 Westminster.  We take our reviews very seriously, and I think you will be greatly pleased.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: Horrible parking but nice rooms for a Super 8
Summary: If you are towing a trailer this isnt a safe bet....And there is no elevator...The rooms were actually very nice for a Super 8.....

My family and I stayed at at the the Super 8 Westminster to be close to Huntington Beach and Long Beach.  We typically stay near Disneyland, however we decided to venture out of our comfort zone.    First the positives:  This is a Super 8, so we were surprised at the quality of the room. I would say it was one step up from basic. It had a large refrigerator as well as a microwave. It did have older decor, however, we were doing this trip on the cheap and just needed a bed.  The room was about average. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  In general, it is a 10 minute drive to the beach and 15 minute drive to Disneyland.  The overall value is good, you just need to know that this is a bargin hotel and do not have your expectations higher than that,  The negatives:  To be

Reserved a king, non-smoking standard room.   Thought that the "standard" room had fridges, since the website advertised them.  Was advised by the very helpful lady at the front desk that the "executive" room gets the fridge for $6 more.  She told me that it really pays to call the Super8 phone number to verify every time, since the website doesn't guarantee the size of bed or even the smoking preference - and she's learned that the hard way, after working for Super8 for a long time!  Typical Super 8 experience - bed quality, furnishings, room size, etc.  SuperStart breakfast did have a nice selection of fresh fruit and 4 - count it - 4 different kinds of fruit juices in their fruit juice machine.  No yogurt or waffle makers - found that to be the case throughout the trip -

If you have stayed at a Super 8 before then this place will be no surprise to you. It is in a good location and is easy to get to. There are many other hotels and restaurants nearby. The room was clean and acceptable, nothing fancy. HBO on the TV.   It was not noisy on the side of the building I stayed on. The front desk was courteous and helpful when I checked in. The outside doors were locked at all times and you had to use your keycard to get in.   I did not eat breakfast or use the Spa so I can not comment on them. This was one of the most inexpensive hotels I could find in the Westminster area. I thought it was good value for the price.

Summary Heading: ok for price but thats it
Summary: Clean, good location, good price, quiet, small rooms.  Staff was hepful, but seemed distracted, matter of fact, and not very friendly.  Spa is supposed to be open from 6 am to 11 Pm.   It was closed by 10:30 and still not open at 10 AM.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing Super 8 Westminster for your recent stay in our area.  I am glad that you found the it to be a clean place, with a good location and good price.    Thank you for giving us a review, it is very much appreciated.  Upon receipt of your review, the following steps were taken:  • Staff received additional training in the courteous manner in which they are to treat you, our valued guest.  It was emphasized that being helpful is good, but being courteous and friendly is necessary also.  • Spa staff received additional training in properly maintaining their product.  It also was made clear that the open hours must coincide with what is advertised.  I hope that the next time you visit our area, you will once again choose to stay at Super 8 Westminster.  We take our reviews very seriously, and I think you will be greatly pleased.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.
